page.title: 13LIFE STYLES
page.content: The life style of the population in this area is basically simple that is to say the lack of general amenities does not seem to worry too many of the inhabitants and on the whole it is only newcomers to the area, of which there are comparatively few who worry about not having all the services such as main drainage and trains nearby Most people were happy with a bus service which passed the door only twice a day and people with buses four times a day thought that was extremely good Most people seemed to be quite prepared and able to drive to the nearest town some 10 miles distant for anything they required other than the basics which were sold in the village shop Train services were 5 miles distant
